channel.title: ummm... has vbulletin had any OTHER crashes?
channel.description:
[url]https://www.facepunch.com/[/url]
ummm... wtf? is this the same thing? if so, as soon as it's back up, im so stealing the names craptasket, nerdboy, garry, and hezzy

item.title: ummm... has vbulletin had any OTHER crashes?
item.dc:creator: Dillxn
item.description:
Josh Hubi:

muhaha, time to feel stupid = /

Problem Solved.

Umm… yeah, I really should feel stupid because I knew long before this that he was planning on moving to amazon’s server services a while ago. In my defense, I didn’t know that it would cause any problems, and didn’t make the logical connection.

Read full topic

item.title: ummm... has vbulletin had any OTHER crashes?

item.description:
:puts on her conspiracy theory hat: someone is trying to hunt down and kill black mesa. Why they think our precious cargo is located in the same place our forums are I have no idea. idiots!

item.title: ummm... has vbulletin had any OTHER crashes?
item.dc:creator: SteveUK
item.description:
bountyhunter219:

https://www.facepunch.com/

ummm… wtf? is this the same thing? if so, as soon as it’s back up, im so stealing the names craptasket, nerdboy, garry, and hezzy

Are you really that dumb? vBulletin forums aren’t hosted on the same server and if you paid attention to the facepunch status message, garry’s twitter or blog you would know why it’s down.

Read full topic
item.source: ummm... has vbulletin had any OTHER crashes?

item.title: ummm... has vbulletin had any OTHER crashes?
item.dc:creator: Hubicorn
item.description:
muhaha, time to feel stupid = /

Happy Star Wars Day!15:43 4.05.2009, Garry Newman, e/n, Garry’s Blog
May the 4th be with you!

Everything except the forums is now running on Amazon’s servers. I did plan to move the forums today - but I forgot it was a bank holiday, so I’ll probably do it tomorrow when it isn’t so busy. But knowing me I’ll probably just think Fuck It after I’ve been in the shower and start moving them over anyway

Problem Solved.

Read full topic
item.source: ummm... has vbulletin had any OTHER crashes?

item.title: ummm... has vbulletin had any OTHER crashes?
item.dc:creator: Hubicorn
item.description:
I guess so, well facepunch is just a blank page now. I tried to contact garry but I got no answer yet = /

Read full topic
item.source: ummm... has vbulletin had any OTHER crashes?

item.title: ummm... has vbulletin had any OTHER crashes?
item.dc:creator: Dillxn
item.description:
Josh Hubi:

Which could lead to believing it was an attack.

That actually makes the most sense. Considering it was all of the hard drives, I’d say it wasn’t coincidence.

Well, let’s hope you find any vulnerabilities that may have been exploited, to prevent any future possible attacks.

Read full topic
item.source: ummm... has vbulletin had any OTHER crashes?

item.title: ummm... has vbulletin had any OTHER crashes?
item.dc:creator: Hubicorn
item.description:
at this time, as we looked on how we lost data and it looks like the HD was wiped. With our system reading the drive as 0MB. Which could lead to believing it was an attack. But we have no idea for sure.

At this time Facepunch is facing the same problem we had before our drives died. Around the same time as us too. I really don’t know what’s going on over there so don’t quote me on this. Let’s hope they are only having a small server issue.

Read full topic
item.source: ummm... has vbulletin had any OTHER crashes?

item.title: ummm... has vbulletin had any OTHER crashes?
item.dc:creator: Dillxn
item.description:
Josh Hubi:

https://www.facepunch.com … how ironic.

You weren’t hosting them too, were you Josh?
Or maybe this really is a big conspiracy that vBulletin had a doomsday remotely set in their forums…

Read full topic
